home.title: Ummeti Foundation â€“ Zakat & Sadaqah Fundraising for Those in Need
home.description: Ummeti Foundation is a trusted Islamic nonprofit dedicated to collecting Zakat, Sadaqah, and donations to support the poor, orphans, and those in crisis. Join us in fulfilling your Islamic duty through charity, humanitarian aid, and sustainable relief projects worldwide. Donate today!

HeroSection.title: Be a helping hand
HeroSection.description: Contribute to building a better future for the nation

AboutSection.title: Who are we?
AboutSection.description: We are a group of young professionals from diverse fields, including administration, engineering, accounting, and law. Brought together by shared interests, we are united by a vision to make a positive impact on society.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become a leading force in community service, driving innovation, and promoting sustainable development.

mission.title: Our Mission
description: Develop and implement community projects that address societal needs and drive meaningful change.
Partner with local and international organizations to exchange expertise and adopt best practices.
Empower our members through continuous training, skill development, and professional growth.

goals.title: Our Goals
description: Raise community awareness and foster a culture of volunteerism.
Launch sustainable development projects across various sectors.
Promote social solidarity and provide support to those in need.
Encourage innovation and creativity among young people.
Build strong partnerships at both local and international levels.

values.title: Our Values
description: Integrity and transparency in all our endeavors.
Collaboration and teamwork to achieve greater impact.
Commitment to excellence and achieving meaningful goals.
Respect for diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunities.

AboutPage.title: About Ummeti
AboutPage.description: Ummeti is a global organization aimed at supporting the issues of the Islamic nation and advocating for the Palestinian cause.

vision.title: Ummeti's Vision
vision.content: A global organization working within an institutional framework...

objectives.title: Ummeti's Objectives
objectives.content: Unifying and coordinating the efforts of the Islamic nation...

uniqueness.title: What Sets Ummeti Apart?
uniqueness.content: A global network with access to resources, institutional work, and transparency.

targetGroups.title: Targeted Groups
targetGroups.content: Those affected by wars, refugees, displaced individuals, oppressed groups, and orphans.
